name: Crude Upgrades

items.alias: Improved Black Clan Heavy Tank Armor

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Crude Upgrade Kits drop from Escaped Prisoners. #L "Crude Upgrade Kit" "274975" #L "Reflex Pistol" "274977" #L "Black Clan Heavy Tank Armor" "206662" #L "Hacked Medi-Blade" "274974" #L "Infused Solar-Powered Master Engineer Pistol" "274557" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Reflex Pistol + Crude Upgrade Kit = #L "Twitch Pistol" "274979" Black Clan Heavy Tank Armor + Crude Upgrade Kit = #L "Improved Black Clan Heavy Tank Armor" "274987" Hacked Medi-Blade + Crude Upgrade Kit = #L "Improved Hacked Medi-Blade" "274978" Infused Solar-Powered Master Engineer Pistol + Crude Upgrade Kit = #L "Augmented Master Engineer Pistol" "274973" Skills: | 1350 WS, 2100 ME and 2100 EE |
